references: L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 78.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
maple: for n from 1 to 40 do printf(`%d,`,coeff(expand(sum(x^j, j=0..3)^n), x, n-1)) od:F := (t-1)^2*(t^2+1)^2/(2*t^3-t^2+1);  G := t/((t-1)*(t^2+1)); Ginv := RootOf(numer(G-x),t);  ogf := series(eval(F,t=Ginv),x=0,20); - Mark van Hoeij, Oct 30 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Aug 21 2000
